title: tour: Cursor keys on external iPad keyboard don't work in code editor
body:
Context: https://tour.golang.org/basics/4

I was attempting to learn go during my morning commute on my iPad and found that my external keyboard does not work fully in the code input area - typing works and deleting work as expected, but the arrow keys do not move the cursor around.

I tried this in both Safari and Chrome (which may or may not make a difference if it uses a webkit view under the hood) â€“ I'm not sure how to find out any more info from moblile Safari/Chrome as to what the error might be.

(A normal text like this one on Github work with the arrow keys.)
